long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
PRODUCTION BUILD.

This annotation plugin helps users to enter custom annotations to the document they are currently viewing. The Annotations helps to classify and categorize the documents. Currently this plugin can be used to lexis360.fr and sesame applications. The plugin will contact SIE internal webservices to fetch the annotations which will be returned by prediction AI.
long.en: This annotation plugin helps users to enter custom annotations to the document they are currently viewing. The Annotations helps to classify and categorize the documents. Currently this plugin can be used to lexis360.fr and sesame applications. The plugin will contact SIE internal webservices to fetch the annotations which will be returned by prediction AI.
